body.p: Other IFRSs require the inclusion of some employee benefit costs within the cost of assets, such as inventories and property, plant and equipment (see IAS 2 and IAS 16 ). Any post‑employment benefit costs included in the cost of such assets include the appropriate proportion of the components listed in paragraph 120.
